description: SQL injection: raw SQL built by concatenating the project id into a query string
Unsafe raw SQL execution helper used by Edge Functions (no parameterization)
Unsafe query-builder usage: user-controlled `.or()` filter string passed directly to PostgREST query builder
Command injection: repoUrl concatenated into shell command when toggle enabled
Stored XSS: dangerouslySetInnerHTML renders project.description_html from DB
